post:

1) this is offers can be delay in deploy up to 5 working days due of huge demand (we know due of past experience) so if you need your vps asap please do not buy. Once the vps is provided we will change the next due date , in this case you will not lost nothing.

2) this is a openvz 6 offer so you  can install ONLY THE TEMPLATE WITCH IS ALREADY IN THE LIST DO NOT ASK FOR OTHERS , DO NOT TRY TO UPDATE YOURSELF BECAUSE YOUR VPS WILL BE BROKEN .**

iptables , tun/tap, fuse will be aviable if you open a tiket about this , to make our job more easy please put the key words in the subject line in the tiket , exemple "i need fuse" , in this case the tiket will go directly to the proper department and will be more rappid .
